summary:
Born in London, raised in Cyprus and now I travel the world doing what I love most; Sharing my passion for esports with an audience. 

My job as an esports commentator is to bring the stories of the teams and players in a match to life while guiding the viewers through the emotions one may experience within it. 

The past 3 years I have worked on 80+ events across esports titles such as VALORANT and CS:GO rapidly learning the craft and becoming a well respected member of the scene. 

I pride myself in being valuable both on and off air, as I have developed the skills of helping give the broadcast the identity it needs by aiding in the creation of narratives and story-lines as well as contriving content ideas.
